full_summary:
### Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Group C

#### Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: cb-784-90355586
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: W6399-24LP55/A

**Publication Date**: 2023-10-25
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-24T14:00:00 (Closed)
**Amendment Date**: 2023-11-24

**Procurement Details**
====================================

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor for the provision of Vehicle Repair and Maintenance Group C services. This tender is for a Request for Standing Offer (RSFO) to supply periodic maintenance and repair services for heavy commercial equipment.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The contractor will provide maintenance and repair services for various types of heavy commercial equipment, including front end loaders, forklifts, tractors, skidsteers, and off-road equipment.

**Duration**
------------

The contract duration will be for three (3) firm years from the date of the Standing Offer(s) issuance, with the option to extend the period by two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

**Important Documents**
----------------------

The following documents are available for download:

* English: [w6399-24-lp55_rfso_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23142/w6399-24-lp55_rfso_en.pdf)
* French: [w6399-24-lp55_rfso_fr_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23142/w6399-24-lp55_rfso_fr_1.pdf)

**Eligibility**
---------------

This tender is open to all suppliers who meet the specified eligibility requirements.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For any inquiries or questions related to this tender, please contact:

Mariela Ileto
Email: [mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca](mailto:mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 945-2746

**Note**
------

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
